titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the commanding of all souldiers, lately imployed in the fleete, vpon their arriuall, not to depart from thir colours..
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
